comment: Took Prof. Yiin for the senior design class and his industry knowledge really shines through. He also had a couple of contacts from the real world lecture to the class and offer advice. He will meet with the individual design groups and give constructive feedback on how the team is advancing. Be wary as he often talks beyond the class end time.

Dr Yiin cares a lot about his students and their success. Neural Networks is hard class but Dr. Yiin does good at describing the material. Its overwhelming at times with new info & words, but once you work through some examples it isn't awful. HW & Lecture code files resemble tests very closely. Also some projects on face & digit recognition
Dr Yiin is a great professor. His lectures are easy to keep up with and very informative. He has a lot of knowledge and insight and it's easy to follow. Labs are enjoyable in the course as well
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: This class is straight forward and Dr. Yiin is easily one of the best professors in this department. Also, attendance is mandatory.

Dr. Yiin is a great guide for CPE Senior Proposal with his knowledge from the industry over the years. He is a fair grader and he will help you to the best of his ability. He likes to have meetings with each individual group to see where you are. There may be some scheduling issues, but he is learning the pace of teaching a college course.

Dr. Yiin is a great professor. It is his first time teaching this semester but he brings very insightful knowledge from working in the industry for many years. There may be some scheduling issues, but he is learning the pace of teaching a college course. Grades mainly come from labs, reading assignments, and a midterm and a final group project.
